entities.name: Harry Potter
entities.description: The protagonist, a young wizard famous for surviving the killing curse as an infant. He possesses a lightning-shaped scar on his forehead and is a Parselmouth.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone.epub
Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.epub

entities.name: Ronald Weasley
entities.description: Harry's best friend, the youngest son of the Weasley family. He is loyal, plays wizard chess well, and suffers from arachnophobia.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone.epub
Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Hermione Granger
entities.description: Harry's best friend, extremely intelligent and studious. She solves the mystery of the Basilisk but is Petrified.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone.epub
Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Lord Voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, a Dark Wizard who killed Harry's parents. He appears as a parasite on Quirrell in the first book and as a memory preserved in a diary in the second.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone.epub
Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Albus Dumbledore
entities.description: The Headmaster of Hogwarts, considered the greatest wizard of modern times and the only one Voldemort fears.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone.epub
Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Severus Snape
entities.description: The Potions Master and Head of Slytherin House. He holds a grudge against Harry but protects him.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone.epub
Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Rubeus Hagrid
entities.description: The Keeper of Keys and Grounds at Hogwarts. He was framed for opening the Chamber of Secrets fifty years ago.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone.epub
Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Draco Malfoy
entities.description: Harry's nemesis at Hogwarts, a wealthy pure-blood student who bullies others.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone.epub
Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Ginevra Weasley
entities.description: Ron's younger sister who is possessed by Tom Riddle's diary and forced to open the Chamber of Secrets.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Gilderoy Lockhart
entities.description: The Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher in Harry's second year. He is a celebrity wizard and a fraud who steals other wizards' achievements.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Dobby
entities.description: A house-elf who tries to warn Harry about the plot to reopen the Chamber of Secrets. He serves the Malfoy family until Harry frees him.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
entities.description: A British wizarding boarding school teaching the magical arts.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: The Chamber of Secrets
entities.description: A legendary secret room constructed by Salazar Slytherin to house a monster intended to purge the school of Muggle-borns.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: The Sorcerer's Stone

attributes.creator: Nicolas Flamel
attributes.magical_properties: Turns metal to gold, produces Elixir of Life

entities.description: A legendary alchemical substance capable of turning any metal into gold and producing the Elixir of Life.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Tom Riddle's Diary
entities.description: A diary created by Tom Riddle that can think for itself and possess those who write in it. It was used to open the Chamber of Secrets.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Godric Gryffindor's Sword

attributes.creator: Goblins
attributes.magical_properties: Appears to true Gryffindors in need

entities.description: A goblin-made sword belonging to Godric Gryffindor, pulled from the Sorting Hat by Harry Potter.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: The Basilisk
entities.description: A giant serpent bred by Salazar Slytherin and hidden in the Chamber of Secrets. Its gaze kills, but indirect eye contact causes petrification.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Aragog
entities.description: An Acromantula (giant spider) raised by Hagrid. He lives in the Forbidden Forest with his colony.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Fawkes

attributes.magical_abilities: Healing tears, rebirth from ashes, immense strength

entities.description: Albus Dumbledore's pet phoenix. He helps Harry defeat the Basilisk.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 2 - Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

relationships.description: Harry and Ron become best friends and participate in numerous adventures together, including saving the Sorcerer's Stone and entering the Chamber of Secrets.
relationships.evidence: Harry and Ron moved closer together to block the fire from view; they were sure it wouldn’t be allowed.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are close friends who solve mysteries together.
relationships.evidence: But from that moment on, Hermione Granger became their friend. There are some things you can’t share without ending up liking each other, and knocking out a twelve-foot mountain troll is one of them.

relationships.description: Voldemort killed Harry's parents and attempts to kill Harry multiple times.
relationships.evidence: Voldemort,” said Riddle softly, “is my past, present, and future, Harry Potter. …

relationships.description: Harry and Draco are school rivals.
relationships.evidence: Harry had never believed he would meet a boy he hated more than Dudley, but that was before he met Draco Malfoy.

relationships.description: Dumbledore acts as a mentor and protector to Harry.
relationships.evidence: First of all, Harry, I want to thank you,” said Dumbledore, eyes twinkling again. “You must have shown me real loyalty down in the Chamber.

relationships.description: Harry pulls the sword from the Sorting Hat and uses it to kill the Basilisk.
relationships.evidence: Harry threw his whole weight behind the sword and drove it to the hilt into the roof of the serpent’s mouth

relationships.description: Harry is bitten by the Basilisk but saved by Fawkes; Harry kills the Basilisk with the sword.
relationships.evidence: The basilisk lunged again, and this time its aim was true — Harry threw his whole weight behind the sword and drove it to the hilt into the roof of the serpent’s mouth

relationships.description: Ginny writes in the diary and is possessed by it.
relationships.evidence: His d-diary!” Ginny sobbed. “I’ve b-been writing in it, and he’s been w-writing back all year —”

relationships.description: Tom Riddle created the diary to preserve his sixteen-year-old self.
relationships.evidence: I decided to leave behind a diary, preserving my sixteen-year-old self in its pages

relationships.description: Harry enters the Chamber to save Ginny.
relationships.evidence: He was standing at the end of a very long, dimly lit chamber.

relationships.description: Hagrid raised Aragog from an egg.
relationships.evidence: A traveler gave me to Hagrid when I was an egg. Hagrid was only a boy, but he cared for me

relationships.description: Harry frees Dobby from the Malfoys.
relationships.evidence: Harry Potter freed Dobby!” said the elf shrilly... “Harry Potter set Dobby free!”

schema_proposals.name: friend_of
schema_proposals.description: Indicates a close platonic bond between characters, distinct from familial bonds or mentorship.

schema_proposals.name: owned_by
schema_proposals.description: Indicates ownership or a pet-master relationship between a creature and a character (e.g., Hagrid and Fang, Harry and Hedwig).

schema_proposals.name: House
schema_proposals.description: A subdivision of a school (e.g., Gryffindor, Slytherin). Currently mapped to Organization, but distinct in function.
